features.name: Public Website - Home & Landing
features.description: Responsive marketing homepage for Om Chabahil Dental Hospital with hero, services highlights, testimonials, doctor highlights, statistics, and call-to-action buttons for booking appointments and contacting the clinic.

features.name: Public Website - Academic Programs
features.description: Listing and detail pages for academic programs (BDS, MDS, internships) including curriculum overview, eligibility, and application CTAs.

features.name: Public Website - Services & Departments
features.description: Services listing and departmental breakdown for clinical treatments (general dentistry, orthodontics, implants, etc.) with details for each service.

features.name: Public Website - Doctors & Profiles
features.description: Doctor listing and profile pages with specialization, department, experience, schedule availability, and profile images.

features.name: Public Website - Appointment Booking
features.description: Online appointment booking form allowing patients to select doctor, department, preferred date/time, and contact details with backend persistence.

features.name: Public Website - Blog & Dental Knowledge Hub
features.description: Blog listing and detail pages for dental articles and knowledge hub content, including categories, tags, and reading time.

features.name: Public Website - Testimonials & Gallery
features.description: Patient testimonials carousel and media galleries for clinic photos, campus images, and treatment visuals backed by media library.

features.name: Public Website - Contact & Enquiry Forms
features.description: Contact us page with map, clinic contact information, and general enquiry form integrated with backend enquiry tracking.

features.name: Admin Panel - Authentication & Authorization
features.description: Admin login, JWT-based authentication, role-based access control for super_admin, admin, and staff, including remember-me and reset-password flows.

features.name: Admin Panel - Dashboard & Layout
features.description: Admin shell layout with sidebar navigation, top bar, and dashboard overview cards for appointments, patients, and content stats.

features.name: Admin Panel - Doctors Management
features.description: CRUD management for doctors including department assignment, status toggling, and profile details with integration to appointments.

features.name: Admin Panel - Appointments Management
features.description: View and filter all appointments with actions to confirm, cancel, complete, and mark no-show, linked to doctors and services.

features.name: Admin Panel - Content Pages CMS
features.description: Lightweight CMS for managing SEO and hero content of core pages (Home, About, Services, Academics, Contact) with section-based storage.

features.name: Admin Panel - Media Library & Gallery
features.description: Media library with Cloudinary-backed uploads, folder filtering, and CRUD for media metadata used by gallery and content sections.

features.name: Admin Panel - Testimonials Management
features.description: CRUD interface for managing patient testimonials including rating, visibility toggle, and content that appears on public site.

features.name: Admin Panel - Blog Management
features.description: Blog management UI for listing posts, publishing/unpublishing, editing content, and deleting posts, wired to blog backend.

features.name: Admin Panel - Enquiries Management
features.description: Admin inbox for website enquiries with filtering by status and type, ability to respond, and close enquiries.

features.name: Admin Panel - Users & Roles Management
features.description: CRUD for admin, staff, and doctor user accounts, including role assignment, activation/deactivation, and password reset.

features.name: AI Chatbot Integration
features.description: Backend service for AI-powered FAQ/chatbot using OpenAI API to assist patients and students on the website.

features.name: Notifications (Email, SMS, WhatsApp)
features.description: Notification services for sending email, SMS, and WhatsApp alerts for appointments and enquiries (using mock providers in development).

features.name: Infrastructure & Configuration
features.description: Shared NestJS and Next.js configuration including validation, global prefixes, env handling, database connection, and queue setup.
